-- | simple Peano numbers
--   
--   Peano numbers without extra fluff, mainly for type level computations
--   in promoted form
@package Peano
@version 0.0.4


-- | Peano numbers without any extra fluff
module Data.Peano
data Peano
Zero :: Peano
Succ :: Peano -> Peano
plus :: Peano -> Peano -> Peano
times :: Peano -> Peano -> Peano
infinity :: Peano
instance Show Peano
instance Read Peano
instance Eq Peano
instance Ord Peano
